@BillGates There's someting VERY WRONG with your Tweet... If read carefully one can read:
The fact that #Coronavirus or #COVID19 could be a once-in-a-century #pandemic is bad new$, BUT the good news is that the next #epidemic is already scheduled (in this very century) and therefore "we"...
